title: Amano Kozue Tanpenshuu
sinopse:
Collection of short stories by Amano Kozue.

Volume 1. Mukuukai:

-   Zenyasai
-   Ichigo-chan Panic
-   Setsuna no Natsu
-   Chiisana Seiya
-   Mukuukai: Hiraku Yume no Tobira

Volume 2. Sora no Uta:

-   Sora no Uta
-   Mahou no Yuubinya-san
-   ANGEL VOICE
-   Earth: Episode II A Planet Named EARTH

Volume 3. Himawari
